quizzes.name: Gentle Beginnings
items: I enjoy learning small new things about my partner every day.
We find simple ways to have fun together.
I feel comfortable being myself around my partner.
Being with my partner feels natural and relaxed.

quizzes.name: Warm Vibes
items: My partner helps create a warm atmosphere in our daily life.
I often feel uplifted when we spend time together.
We greet each other in a pleasant, affectionate way.
Being around my partner usually puts me in a good mood.

quizzes.name: Simple Joys
items: We appreciate small joyful moments together.
Simple activities feel meaningful with my partner.
We have small routines that bring us joy.
I feel happy sharing everyday experiences with my partner.
Small joys help strengthen our bond.
